Segment.name: PTS
Segment.comment: To provide data required for proper notification or determination of applicable taxes applying to the transaction

Field.comment: Code identifying the status of a business transaction, such as a claim, policy, real estate, or securities transaction

Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: TaxServicePaymentCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the tax payment requirements of a taxing authority

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.comment: Code identifying the status of a business transaction, such as a claim, policy, real estate, or securities transaction

Field.name: TaxJurisdictionCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the source of the data used in tax jurisdiction code

Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content
